overview: Ridwan is a blind masseur. Once upon a night he and his wife were arguing about the excess tips he was receiving. Ridwan intends to return the tips. But Siti (his wife) said differently, because of a very urgent need. The next day Ridwan called Agus but Agus could not be contacted. Ridwan still went to the location where he massaged his customers, even though he did not know where it was. Ridwan also tried to find the place from the sources of the sound he heard when returning from a massage
title: Mata Tertutup
